name: UGS2022 Spooter
description:
UGS2022 Spooter - WebGL Test Build Controls:

W, S — Thruster forward/reverse
A, D — Rotate clockwise / ccw
Space — Speed Boost
Left Mouse — Fire Lasers
Right Mouse — Fire Torpedo
E — Space Mine
Q — Homing Missiles (while targeting enemy)

Instructions:

Defeat each wave to gain a ship upgrade and recharge some shields. Don't crash into stars, but don't move too far away either.  In space no one can hear you curse.

Tips:
  • Save some energy to get away from a star's gravity well.
  • Flying closely past a star is a good way to lose pursuers.
  • The torpedo is hard to aim with, but it hits very hard.
  • Crashing into enemies hurts a lot more than their fire.
